name: Idle Pixel Art Coloring Book
description:
Idle Pixel Art Coloring - Tap tap to color clicker is Idle game about painting and drawing in a Pixel art graphics. Start coloring pixel coloring book now! Enjoy pictures of animals, faces, birds butterflies and many more coloring pages. Idle pixel art coloring helps you to feel better and relax. No need for internet connection to start tapping, making money and coloring.

Why the idle pixel art coloring book? 
- First and best idle game of its kind in the store
- Unique theme: Pixel art hive where bees are idle painting the puzzle.
- Easy to play painter: tap to draw & color, make money and do upgrades or just go idle. No need to color by number.
- 5 types of upgrades: painting and tapping speed, more money for coloring and tapping, additional Bee to color twice as fast.
- Relax and ease the stress by tapping or watching bees drawing and coloring the picture.
- Idle game for everyone.
- All pixel art coloring pages are for free.

- Best Antistress app
Forget about daily stress and let Tap tap clicker game be your personal therapist. Sit down tap a little, upgrade the hive, color and paint few puzzles, tap a little more, buy bees and then go idle! Great for morning relaxation meditation.

- Compatibility and support.
We're continuously improving the idle coloring book so that all devices run the game. Let us help to improve the game by leaving an honest review in the store.

Now let’s do some IDLE coloring!!!
